Question.txt: If you like, you could help me catch some fish.
Yeah, I have seen Yimo. It was only a few days ago, she was very excited about something.

Conversation.Response: Why in such a hurry. Here help do some fishing first.
Conversation.Quest: Well now that you mention it. She was in quite a hurry and kept on saying 'the myth is true, the myth is true'.

Question.txt: I had no idea what she was going on about and that's the last I saw her.

Conversation.Response: I don't know . There are many myths that live on this island. Maybe you will find out if you find Yimo.
Thanks for rescuing Yimo. The tribe really appreciates your work.

Game.wingame: Thanks for the help with the fishing.
